name: CQ.Ext.slider.Thumb
doc: Represents a single thumb element on a Slider. This would not usually be created manually and wou...

configs.name: constrain
configs.doc: True to constrain the thumb so that it cannot overlap its siblings

props.name: dragging
props.doc: True while the thumb is in a drag operation

methods.name: disable
methods.doc: Disables the thumb if it is currently enabled

methods.name: enable
methods.doc: Enables the thumb if it is currently disabled

methods.name: initEvents
methods.doc: Sets up an CQ.Ext.dd.DragTracker for this thumb

methods.name: render
methods.doc: Renders the thumb into a slider
